reviewText: watching or reading you just can't go wrong with Arthur. The stories are engaging for children of all ages and even adults.
My 4 year old grand daughter enjoys DW as much as her brother Arthur.  Some days it is quite decision over which DVD to watch.  Good messages.

We all love Arthur!!! This is a show my entire family loves to watch. I have an 8yr old, 6yr old and a soon to be 3yr old and we all love to sit together and watch Arthur. This is a good family cartoon- with good lessons.
One of my son's favorites !
Nice
Thumbs up!
Great Video

My 8 year old  loves the Arthur books, and now he is really enjoying the Arthur shows.  I was happy to find this DVD had so many episodes on it.  It contains 8 episodes, that run approximately 12 minutes long each for a total run time of 104 minutes.  They are:

D.W. Goes to Washington
Arthur Goes to Camp
Arthur's Family Vacation
Grandpa Dave's Old Country Farm
The Shore Thing
Arthur's Mystery Envelope
Buster Makes the Grade
It's a No-Brainer

This is definitely a great show for kids, and you can't beat the price!!
My grandkids love Arthur and so does Grandma!  They are so entertaining and always teach a lesson in the process!
Arthur is my 8 years olds favorite. These episodes are great for traveling so she always has something to watch in the evening
Great Arthur movie! It includes lots of episodes for the price. I enjoy the live action scenes from class rooms.
My kids loves this show! It's the only dvd that seems to calm my toddler down when he's upset. I would love to buy the entire series.
Classic Arthur episodes. Kids love it! What's not to like? Includes episodes on finding the "Ocean Zone" and going on the Read family vacation.
Cute compilation sure to keep your kiddos entertained
